alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hancock; Taliaferro (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, southeastern Greene and Taliaferro Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 608 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Siloam to Liberty, and moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Crawfordville, Union Point, White Plains, Siloam, Liberty, Springfield, Powelton, Veazey, Robinson, Lyneville and Alexander Stephens Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
